original_text: And Joseph found grace in his sight, and he served him: and he made him overseer over his house, and all that he had he put into his hand.
korean_text: 요셉이 그의 주인에게 은혜를 입어 섬기매 그가 요셉을 가정 총무로 삼고 자기의 소유를 다 그의 손에 위탁하니

sentences.original_text: And Joseph found grace in his sight
and he made him overseer over his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그로 그의 집을 다스리는 자로 삼고
